message: Bob, I have a product I believe would be of great value to you. It's something I've put a lot of effort into, and I know it aligns perfectly with your needs. I'm offering it to you for $1,250,000, which is a price I feel is fair considering its worth. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested. If not, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $1,200,000.
